ValidationRule.description: Decline reason is required, if Application status is Declined or Cancelled
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( AU_Application_Decline_Reason__c , ''), OR( ISPICKVAL( Application_Status__c , 'Declined'), ISPICKVAL( Application_Status__c , 'Cancelled') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please specify decline reason, if Application status is Declined or cancelled.
